verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> say <S%G2980><s%> <S%G4771><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> fit <S%G4241><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine, <S%G1319><s%>

that <S%G1511><s%> older men <S%G4246><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> temperate, <S%G4998><s%> sensible, <S%G3524><s%> sober minded, <S%G4998><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> in faith, <S%G4102><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%> and in patience: <S%G5281><s%>

and that <S%G3361><s%> older women <S%G4247><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> be reverent <S%G2412><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> behavior, <S%G2688><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> slanderers <S%G1228><s%> nor <S%G3361><s%> enslaved <S%G1402><s%> to much <S%G4183><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> teachers of that which is good; <S%G2567><s%>
that <S%G2443><s%> they may train <S%G4994><s%> the young women <S%G3501><s%> <S%G1511><s%> <S%G4994><s%> to love their husbands, <S%G5362><s%> to love their children, <S%G5388><s%>

to be sober minded, <S%G4998><s%> chaste, <S%G53><s%> workers at home, <S%G3626><s%> kind, <S%G18><s%> being in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands, <S%G435><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s word <S%G3056><s%> may not <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G987><s%> blasphemed. <S%G987><s%>
Likewise, <S%G5615><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> the younger men <S%G3501><s%> to be sober minded; <S%G4993><s%>

in <S%G4012><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> showing <S%G3930><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> an example <S%G5179><s%> of good <S%G2570><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your teaching <S%G1319><s%> showing integrity, <S%G90><s%> seriousness, <S%G4587><s%> incorruptibility, <S%G861><s%>

and soundness <S%G5199><s%> of speech <S%G3056><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> can't <S%G176><s%> be condemned; that <S%G2443><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> opposes <S%G1727><s%> you may be ashamed, <S%G1788><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> evil thing <S%G5337><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> about us. <S%G5216><s%>

Exhort servants <S%G1401><s%> to be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> masters, <S%G1203><s%> and to <S%G1511><s%> be well-pleasing <S%G2101><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things; <S%G3361><s%> not contradicting; <S%G483><s%>

not <S%G3361><s%> stealing, <S%G3557><s%> but <S%G235><s%> showing <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> fidelity; <S%G4102><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may adorn <S%G2885><s%> the doctrine <S%G1319><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior, <S%G4990><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has appeared, <S%G2014><s%> bringing <S%G3588><s%> salvation <S%G4992><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G444><s%>

instructing <S%G3811><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to the intent that, <S%G2443><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worldly <S%G2886><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%> we would live <S%G2198><s%> soberly, <S%G4996><s%> righteously, <S%G1346><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> godly <S%G2153><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> world; <S%G165><s%>

looking for <S%G4327><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> appearing <S%G2015><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Savior, <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might redeem <S%G3084><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> iniquity, <S%G458><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> purify <S%G2511><s%> for himself <S%G1438><s%> a people <S%G2992><s%> for his own possession, <S%G4041><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> for good <S%G2570><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

Say <S%G2980><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reprove <S%G1651><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> authority. <S%G2003><s%> Let <S%G4065><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> despise <S%G4065><s%> you. <S%G4675><s%>
